data.title: Grace Lutheran School
data.meta_description: Grace Lutheran School, with NCES ID K9303322, a Private School, is a leading educational institution in Dodge Center, Minnesota, USA, located at 404 Central Ave N, ZIP 55927-Not available.
data.text:
Grace Lutheran School, identified by NCES ID K9303322 and renowned as a private school, stands as a beacon of education in Dodge Center, Minnesota. This institution is known for its dedication to fostering the academic and creative potentials of its students. With its campus located at 404 Central Ave N, ZIP code 55927, it serves as a pivotal educational hub in Dodge County, USA. For more details or assistance, Grace Lutheran School can be contacted at (507) 633-2253.

In the beautiful city of Dodge Center, Grace Lutheran School is celebrated for creating a dynamic learning environment that champions diversity and promotes a sense of belonging among all students. Its efforts to tailor educational experiences to the needs of a varied student body significantly enhance the educational landscape in Minnesota, equipping learners with the skills necessary to thrive in a globally interconnected world.
